text: A dog who saw a doctor attend the funeral of a wealthy patient said, "When do you expect to dig him up?" Why would I dig it up? The doctor asked. When I bury a bone, the dog said, it's with the intention of uncovering it later and biting it. The bones I bury, the doctor said, are the ones I can't chew anymore. FIN
title: El perro y el médico
author: Ambrose Bierce
